title: Last-Minute Survival Secrets (2014).pdf Gooner
description:
Last-Minute Survival Secrets - 128 Ingenious Tips to Endure the Coming Apocalypse and Other Minor Inconveniences (2014).pdf Gooner

Publisher: Chicago Review Press (Nov. 2014)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1613749856
ISBN-13: 978-1613749852

Last-Minute Survival Secrets contains more than a hundred ingenious survival tips that may sound quirky at first but really do work. 

You will discover how to escape perilous situations using common household products:

* Start a campfire with potato chips
* Create a Wi-Fi antenna from a coffee can
* Repair a broken fan belt with a pair of panty hose
* Prevent heatstroke with a disposable diaper
* Remove cactus spines with Elmer's glue
* Open a locked suitcase with a ballpoint pen
* And much, much more!

The book also includes interesting and goofy sidebars related to these survival tactics and fascinating trivia to keep you entertained until FEMA arrivesâ€”which may be a while. It's the perfect resource for armchair survivalists, budding MacGyvers, and adventurists on a budget
